data.text:
That was when I first met that Uma Musume――
On a cloudy day on that tree-lined street.
data.processed:
<story>That was when I first met that Uma Musume――
<story>On a cloudy day on that tree-lined street.

data.text: Hmmmm, looks like today……I won't be able to see it.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Hmmmm, looks like today……I won't be able to see it.

data.text:
She seemed to be looking in to the sky, looking for something. 
She almost felt ephemeral, but she still left an impression――
data.processed:
<story>She seemed to be looking in to the sky, looking for something. 
<story>She almost felt ephemeral, but she still left an impression――

data.text:
Yes!? Ah, I'm sorry! 
I was blocking the middle of the road, wasn't I?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Yes!? Ah, I'm sorry! 
<story>I was blocking the middle of the road, wasn't I?

data.text:
Ah, that badge…… You're a trainer, aren't you!? 
We're always in your care♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Ah, that badge…… You're a trainer, aren't you!? 
<story>We're always in your care♪

data.text: In our care? Does that mean……?

choices.text: Do you already have a trainer?
Do you already have a trainer?

data.processed: <story>In our care? Does that mean……?

data.text:
Well, I……don't have one yet. 
Because――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Well, I……don't have one yet. 
<story>Because――

data.text: I can't really run!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>I can't really run!

data.text:
――An Uma Musume that can't run. I don't know 
the reason, but she……was saying a rather negative 
thing with a bright smile on her face.
data.processed:
<story>――An Uma Musume that can't run. I don't know 
<story>the reason, but she……was saying a rather negative 
<story>thing with a bright smile on her face.

data.text:
――Several days later. There was a Mock race being 
held at Tracen Academy. And participating in it were……
data.processed:
<story>――Several days later. There was a Mock race being 
<story>held at Tracen Academy. And participating in it were……

data.text:
Ha, Brian! It's been a while since our last contest, huh? 
I've been waiting for this moment! It's a showdown!!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Ha, Brian! It's been a while since our last contest, huh? 
<story>I've been waiting for this moment! It's a showdown!!

data.text:
Hmmm, so you're aiming for me, Ama-san. See if you 
can fulfill even a little of――this desire of mine.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm, so you're aiming for me, Ama-san. See if you 
<story>can fulfill even a little of――this desire of mine.

data.text:
――A clash between dragon and tiger. They had not debuted yet, 
but they were considered part of the strongest class. The 
unparalleled "Narita Brian" and the dorm leader "Hishi Amazon".
data.processed:
<story>――A clash between dragon and tiger. They had not debuted yet, 
<story>but they were considered part of the strongest class. The 
<story>unparalleled "Narita Brian" and the dorm leader "Hishi Amazon".

data.text:
The raceground was crowded with a large number 
of spectators due to this outstanding matchup……
data.processed:
<story>The raceground was crowded with a large number 
<story>of spectators due to this outstanding matchup……

data.text:
Waah~, I wonder who will win? 
Brian-chan and Hishi Ama-chan are both really fast and strong!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Waah~, I wonder who will win? 
<story>Brian-chan and Hishi Ama-chan are both really fast and strong!

data.text:
Ah! You're that trainer from before……! 
Hey, which one do you think will win?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Ah! You're that trainer from before……! 
<story>Hey, which one do you think will win?

data.text:
In the audience was that Uma Musume I met before on 
that tree-lined street. The Uma Musume who "can't run".
data.processed:
<story>In the audience was that Uma Musume I met before on 
<story>that tree-lined street. The Uma Musume who "can't run".

data.text:
The excitement of the crowd reached its peak. The curtain 
rose on a fierce competition with many spectators.
data.processed:
<story>The excitement of the crowd reached its peak. The curtain 
<story>rose on a fierce competition with many spectators.

data.text: Huuu……!!
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>Huuu……!!

data.text:
Kuu――!? Just by putting in a little 
effort you can pull this far ahead!?
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Kuu――!? Just by putting in a little 
<story>effort you can pull this far ahead!?

data.text:
I won't lose! I won't let you beat me!! 
Oooooooooooh!!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>I won't lose! I won't let you beat me!! 
<story>Oooooooooooh!!

data.text: Not enough……this isn't enough……to satisfy my desire……
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>Not enough……this isn't enough……to satisfy my desire……

data.text:
More……I need more……! 
Haaa……!!
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>More……I need more……! 
<story>Haaa……!!

data.text: Brian-chan……is amazing……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Brian-chan……is amazing……

data.text:
The result was Narita Brian's victory. Hishi 
Amazon desperately tried to hang on……but ultimately 
ended somewhat behind in 2nd place.
data.processed:
<story>The result was Narita Brian's victory. Hishi 
<story>Amazon desperately tried to hang on……but ultimately 
<story>ended somewhat behind in 2nd place.

data.text:
Ah, damnit!! To think you'd pull that far ahead!! 
Heh, trying to show that I'm not a worthy opponent, huh?
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Ah, damnit!! To think you'd pull that far ahead!! 
<story>Heh, trying to show that I'm not a worthy opponent, huh?

data.text:
――That's not the case. Right now, the only one that 
can even slightly fulfill my desire is you, Ama-san.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>――That's not the case. Right now, the only one that 
<story>can even slightly fulfill my desire is you, Ama-san.

data.text:
Haha, slightly, huh? I don't know whether to be happy or pissed. 
Is there nobody besides me that can fufill that desire?
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Haha, slightly, huh? I don't know whether to be happy or pissed. 
<story>Is there nobody besides me that can fufill that desire?

data.text: ……There isn't.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>……There isn't.

data.text:
Certainly――she was overwhelming. Narita Brian walked 
away from the turf, but with a certain air of emptiness……
data.processed:
<story>Certainly――she was overwhelming. Narita Brian walked 
<story>away from the turf, but with a certain air of emptiness……

data.text: Congratulations, Brian-chan!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Congratulations, Brian-chan!

data.text: ……Yeah.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>……Yeah.

data.text:
She left after just a quick glance. I doubted she 
even recognized the Uma Musume who spoke to her.
data.processed:
<story>She left after just a quick glance. I doubted she 
<story>even recognized the Uma Musume who spoke to her.

data.text:
She's amazing, isn't she!? Brian-chan. By just putting 
in a little effort, she's able to pull away that far……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>She's amazing, isn't she!? Brian-chan. By just putting 
<story>in a little effort, she's able to pull away that far……

data.text:
And from now on, to think she's going to get even 
stronger……she won't lose to anyone! Being able to 
run like that, she's really amazing, isn't she?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>And from now on, to think she's going to get even 
<story>stronger……she won't lose to anyone! Being able to 
<story>run like that, she's really amazing, isn't she?

data.text:
That was the gaze of someone that was star-struck. 
It was almost like she was……
data.processed:
<story>That was the gaze of someone that was star-struck. 
<story>It was almost like she was……

data.text:
I couldn't help but ask. Was this Uma Musume who 
couldn't run entrusting her dreams to Narita Brian?
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't help but ask. Was this Uma Musume who 
<story>couldn't run entrusting her dreams to Narita Brian?

data.text:
Fan……? I wouldn't say I'm a fan. 
Just cheering for her feels kind of distant. I am――
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Fan……? I wouldn't say I'm a fan. 
<story>Just cheering for her feels kind of distant. I am――

data.text:
What was she going to say? "Aspiration" "Goal" "Acquaintance". 
Several words came to mind. but, the words she chose……
data.processed:
<story>What was she going to say? "Aspiration" "Goal" "Acquaintance". 
<story>Several words came to mind. but, the words she chose……

data.text:
I am――the Uma Musume who will win 
against that unbeatable Brian-chan!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>I am――the Uma Musume who will win 
<story>against that unbeatable Brian-chan!

data.text:
……Laurel. 
I'm Sakura Laurel♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>……Laurel. 
<story>I'm Sakura Laurel♪

data.text:
――With those words, a breeze blew past. 
And a single cherry blossom petal swirled around me.
data.processed:
<story>――With those words, a breeze blew past. 
<story>And a single cherry blossom petal swirled around me.
